label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡包含体肝炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"腺病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":36,"end":41,"text":"急性传染病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"禽类","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡包含体肝炎是由腺病毒8型、2型、5型、3型、4型等血清型引起禽类的一种急性传染病。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡包含体肝炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":29,"end":35,"text":"5周龄肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":57,"end":61,"text":"法氏囊病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":62,"end":67,"text":"马立克氏病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":68,"end":73,"text":"贫血病毒病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":74,"end":77,"text":"支原体","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 鸡包含体肝炎可水平传播，亦可垂直传播，在自然条件下，主要是5周龄肉仔鸡易感，蛋鸡和鸽也易感，发病后，逐日增多，如与法氏囊病、马立克氏病、贫血病毒病、支原体等病混合感染，可加重病情，则死亡率增加，甚至全群覆灭。

label: [{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"发热","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"嗜睡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"精神欠佳","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":27,"text":"羽毛蓬乱无光","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"蓬乱无光","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"食欲不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"黄疸","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":45,"text":"拉白色水样稀粪","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":53,"text":"脸部苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":53,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":45,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"冠髯","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"脸部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: (二)临床症状：病鸡发热，嗜睡，精神欠佳，羽毛蓬乱无光，食欲不振，出现黄疸，拉白色水样稀粪，冠髯、脸部苍白，常不见先驱症状而突然死亡，且3～5天达死亡高峰，维持3～5天则停止死亡。

label: [{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"黄疸","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"贫血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":38,"text":"肝脏肿大褪色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":38,"text":"肿大褪色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":43,"text":"黄褐色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"质地脆弱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":56,"end":64,"text":"痘疹状颗粒隆起物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":66,"end":71,"text":"斑状出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":52,"end":55,"text":"黄白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (三)病理变化：可见尸体黄疸，有的贫血，但重要的病变在肝脏，只见肝脏肿大褪色，呈黄褐色，质地脆弱，表面有黄白色、痘疹状颗粒隆起物或者斑状出血点；

label: [{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"肝萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":15,"text":"灰黄色坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"灰黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":19,"text":"肾肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":23,"text":"灰白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":31,"text":"心包有黄色积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":4,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":17,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"心包","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 有的见肝萎缩，并有灰黄色坏死灶；肾肿大呈灰白色；心包有黄色积液；

label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"胸腺及法氏囊萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"骨髓褪色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"褪色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":27,"text":"皮下组织和横纹肌水肿和充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"胸腺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"法氏囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"骨髓","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"皮下组织","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"横纹肌","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 胸腺及法氏囊萎缩，骨髓褪色，皮下组织和横纹肌水肿和充血；

label: [{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"两腿无力","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"伏卧不起","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":28,"text":"胸肌和腿肌黄染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"黄染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"出血斑点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"骨髓","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"两腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"胸肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"腿肌","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 因骨髓有变，常致两腿无力，甚至伏卧不起，使胸肌和腿肌黄染，有出血斑点；

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"肝细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":27,"text":"核内有嗜碱性或嗜酸性核内包含体","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 肝脏触片镜检，发现肝细胞核内有嗜碱性或嗜酸性核内包含体。

label: [{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"环境消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"福尔马林","labels":["drug"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"碘伏","labels":["drug"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"次氯酸钠","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 1.做好环境消毒，可选用福尔马林、碘伏及次氯酸钠等。

label: [{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"引雏健康","labels":["control"]},{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"加强饲养管理","labels":["control"]}]
text: 2.引雏健康，加强饲养管理。

label: [{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":9,"end":15,"text":"特效治疗药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"抗病毒药","labels":["drug"]},{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"抗菌药","labels":["drug"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"肝胆","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"助消化药","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 3.现无疫苗，又无特效治疗药物，可选用抗病毒药，抗菌药，利肝胆和助消化药，连用5～7天，有理想疗效。

label: [{"start":0,"end":10,"text":"心包积水-肝炎综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"肉鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":26,"end":34,"text":"心包蓄积黄色水样","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"胶冻样物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":47,"text":"肝脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"质脆色淡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":58,"end":64,"text":"病毒性传染病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":69,"end":74,"text":"免疫力下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":78,"end":81,"text":"新城疫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":82,"end":87,"text":"大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"心包","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 心包积水-肝炎综合征是一种以3~5周龄肉鸡突然死亡，心包蓄积黄色水样或胶冻样物，并伴有肝脏肿大、质脆色淡为主要特征的病毒性传染病，往往导致免疫力下降，易继发新城疫、大肠杆菌病等疫病，从而加剧病情发展，导致较高的死亡率。

label: [{"start":4,"end":11,"text":"血清4型腺病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":25,"text":"鸡心包积水-肝炎综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":32,"end":38,"text":"鸡包含体肝炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":64,"end":68,"text":"安卡拉病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 目前认为血清4型腺病毒是引起鸡心包积水-肝炎综合征的特异性病原。鸡包含体肝炎首先于1987年在巴基斯坦临近卡拉奇的安哥拉被报道，安卡拉病就由此而得名。

label: [{"start":11,"end":17,"text":"鸡包含体肝炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":52,"end":58,"text":"鸡包含体肝炎","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 1989年墨西哥报道了鸡包含体肝炎的发生，随后在伊拉克、印度、厄瓜多尔、秘鲁、智利、俄罗斯等地相继暴发了鸡包含体肝炎。

label: [{"start":0,"end":10,"text":"心包积水-肝炎综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"肉鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"肉种鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"蛋鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 心包积水-肝炎综合征多发生于肉鸡，肉种鸡和蛋鸡也可发生。潜伏期较短，一般少于2天。

label: [{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"鸡只","labels":["type"]}]
text: 3~6周龄雏鸡最易感染发病，易发生死亡，第4~6周死亡达到高峰，持续1周左右，以后鸡只死亡数量开始减少，病程9~15天，死亡率达20%~80%。一般在30%左右。

label: [{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"气管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":26,"text":"鼻黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 本病可经精液、种蛋垂直传播，也可经粪便、气管、鼻黏膜分泌物水平传播。

label: [{"start":0,"end":1,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡感染后可成为终身带毒者，并可间歇性排毒。

label: [{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"鸡只","labels":["type"]},{"start":11,"end":20,"text":"无明显先兆突然倒地","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"羽毛成束","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"成束","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":31,"end":37,"text":"排黄色稀粪便","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":39,"end":43,"text":"神经症状","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":51,"text":"两腿在空中划动","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":52,"end":59,"text":"病鸡呈卷曲姿势","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":60,"end":66,"text":"数分钟内死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"两腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"黄色","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 其特征是长势良好的鸡只无明显先兆突然倒地，精神沉郁，羽毛成束，排黄色稀粪便，有神经症状，两腿在空中划动，病鸡呈卷曲姿势，数分钟内死亡。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"蛋鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":6,"end":11,"text":"产蛋率下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":18,"text":"鸡包含体肝炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"发病急","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 蛋鸡还会出现产蛋率下降。鸡包含体肝炎发病急，传播迅速，防治不及时，则死亡率较高。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"心脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"心机松软","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"松软","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":24,"text":"心包有淡黄色或黄色浑浊渗出液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":16,"text":"淡黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"心脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"心机","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"心包","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 心脏肿大、心机松软，心包有淡黄色或黄色浑浊渗出液；

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"肝脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"变黄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"质地变脆","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":26,"text":"有条纹状坏死及包涵体坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肝脏肿大、变黄、质地变脆，有条纹状坏死及包涵体坏死灶；

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"肾脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"花斑肾","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"肺脏水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":29,"text":"腺胃和肌胃有出血带","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"出血带","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":40,"text":"大多出血带向腺胃蔓延","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":53,"text":"肌胃角质层发黑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":53,"text":"发黑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"龟裂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":57,"end":59,"text":"糜烂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"肺脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"腺胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"肌胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"腺胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":51,"text":"肌胃角质层","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肾脏肿大、出血，花斑肾：肺脏水肿、瘀血。腺胃和肌胃有出血带，大多出血带向腺胃蔓延，严重者可见肌胃角质层发黑、龟裂、糜烂。

label: [{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"心脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":52,"text":"心包炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"心脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 根据临床症状和剖检变化可做出初步诊断。该疾病主要发生于3~6周龄的雏鸡，其特征病理变化是心脏肿大、心包炎。

label: [{"start":0,"end":18,"text":"心包明显有大量的淡黄色或黄色浑浊积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"淡黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"肝脏变黄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"变黄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"变脆","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":36,"text":"条纹状坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"心包","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 心包明显有大量的淡黄色或黄色浑浊积液；肝脏变黄、变脆、肿大。有条纹状坏死。

label: [{"start":1,"end":19,"text":"肝细胞核内有形状不规则的嗜碱性包涵体","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"肝脏细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":1,"end":4,"text":"肝细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 及肝细胞核内有形状不规则的嗜碱性包涵体可作出初步诊断，如确诊则需要做病鸡肝脏细胞培养，然后分离病毒。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"预防接种","labels":["control"]},{"start":21,"end":24,"text":"灭活苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":41,"end":49,"text":"紧急接种相应疫苗","labels":["control"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"肝组织","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]}]
text: (1)预防接种。用本场病鸡的肝组织制成组织灭活苗，抗体可维持1个月左右，另外，也可紧急接种相应疫苗。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"对症治疗","labels":["control"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":41,"end":44,"text":"新城疫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":45,"end":49,"text":"大肠杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":66,"end":70,"text":"敏感药物","labels":["drug"]}]
text: (2)对症治疗。利水消肿，抗病毒，防继发感染，保护肝脏和肾脏。一旦发病，要注意预防新城疫和大肠杆菌等疫病的继发一旦继发感染，就要利用敏感药物去控制。

label: [{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":29,"end":30,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":31,"end":34,"text":"抗生素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":23,"end":28,"text":"安卡拉病毒","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 尤其要注重避免鸡群出现细菌混合感染，因为感染了安卡拉病毒的鸡对抗生素不敏感。

label: [{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"大肠杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"肝肾","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 此外，在治疗时需注意，如感染了大肠杆菌，在用药时要尽量避免使用对肝肾毒性比较强的药品；

label: [{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"肌胃炎","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 如果有肌胃炎的混合感染，会导致药效降低。

label: [{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"加大药量","labels":["control"]},{"start":11,"end":19,"text":"适当延长用药时间","labels":["control"]}]
text: 在用药时需要加大药量并适当延长用药时间。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"加强管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":8,"end":14,"text":"加强饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"减少应激","labels":["control"]},{"start":20,"end":28,"text":"提高饲料营养水平","labels":["control"]},{"start":35,"end":38,"text":"维生素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":43,"end":46,"text":"葡萄糖","labels":["drug"]},{"start":47,"end":52,"text":"龙胆泻肝散","labels":["drug"]},{"start":53,"end":59,"text":"通肾保肝药品","labels":["drug"]},{"start":62,"end":64,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":29,"end":34,"text":"添加矿物质","labels":["control"]}]
text: (3)加强管理。加强饲养管理。减少应激，提高饲料营养水平，添加矿物质、维生素，配合使用葡萄糖、龙胆泻肝散等通肾保肝药品，提高鸡群抵抗环境应激和疾病的能力。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"改善环境条件","labels":["control"]},{"start":7,"end":16,"text":"保持合理的饲养密度","labels":["control"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"换气通风","labels":["control"]},{"start":24,"end":34,"text":"保证适宜的温度和湿度","labels":["control"]}]
text: 改善环境条件，保持合理的饲养密度，做好换气通风，保证适宜的温度和湿度。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"及时清理鸡舍","labels":["control"]},{"start":7,"end":16,"text":"利用醛类消毒剂消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":9,"end":14,"text":"醛类消毒剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"腺病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"鸡苗","labels":["type"]}]
text: 及时清理鸡舍并利用醛类消毒剂消毒。引种时要从腺病毒净化好的种鸡场进种蛋或鸡苗。
